bikes.name: Honda Beat
bikes.description: Perfect for exploring Lombok's coastal villages and narrow island roads. The Honda Beat is light, nimble, and incredibly fuel-efficient, making it ideal for budget-conscious travelers who want to experience the island's hidden gems without breaking the bank.

bikes.name: Honda Street
bikes.description: A stylish and comfortable choice for casual exploring. The Scoopy Street combines the practicality of a traditional scooter with modern design elements and a comfortable seating position, perfect for leisurely rides around Lombok's scenic spots.

bikes.name: Honda Vario 125
bikes.description: The Vario 125 offers the perfect balance of power and efficiency. With its larger 125cc engine and spacious storage compartment, this bike is great for day trips and exploring multiple destinations without the need for frequent refueling.

bikes.name: Honda Vario 160
bikes.description: For those seeking more power and comfort. The Vario 160 comes with advanced features including a USB charger for your devices and premium comfort seating. Its responsive handling makes tackling Lombok's winding mountain roads an absolute pleasure.

bikes.name: Honda PCX 160
bikes.description: The ultimate premium scooter experience. With its impressive 160cc engine, integrated ABS braking system, and luxury features, the PCX 160 is built for travelers who demand the best. Premium LED lights and digital dashboard make every ride memorable.

bikes.name: Yamaha NMAX 155
bikes.description: A sporty and powerful choice for adventure seekers. The Yamaha NMAX 155 delivers dynamic performance with its 155cc engine and sleek design. ABS brakes ensure safety on every curve, while excellent fuel efficiency keeps your costs down on long island explorations.
